price: I spomeni Ismaila, i Idrisa, i Zulkifla, a svi su oni bili strpljivi.
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدۡرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wa-id'rīsa wadhā al-kif'li kullun mina al-ṣābirīna
